Yii Framework v2.0.0-dev Class Reference

Abstract Class yii\caching\Dependency

All Classes | Properties | Methods
Inheritanceyii\caching\Dependency » yii\base\Object
Implementsyii\base\Arrayable
Subclassesyii\caching\ChainedDependency, yii\caching\DbDependency, yii\caching\ExpressionDependency, yii\caching\FileDependency, yii\caching\GroupDependency
Available since version2.0
Source Code
Dependency is the base class for cache dependency classes.

Child classes should override its generateDependencyData() for generating the actual dependency data.

Public Properties

Hide inherited properties

PropertyTypeDescriptionDefined By
$data mixed The dependency data that is saved in cache and later is compared with the latest dependency data yii\caching\Dependency
$reusable boolean Whether this dependency is reusable or not yii\caching\Dependency

Protected Methods

MethodDescriptionDefined By
generateDependencyData() Generates the data needed to determine if dependency has been changed. yii\caching\Dependency

Property Details

$data property
mixed $data = null

The dependency data that is saved in cache and later is compared with the latest dependency data.

$reusable property
boolean $reusable = false

Whether this dependency is reusable or not. True value means that dependent data for this cache dependency will be generated only once per request. This allows you to use the same cache dependency for multiple separate cache calls while generating the same page without an overhead of re-evaluating dependency data each time. Defaults to false.

Method Details

evaluateDependency() method
void evaluateDependency( $cache )
$cache yii\caching\Cache The cache component that is currently evaluating this dependency

Evaluates the dependency by generating and saving the data related with dependency.

This method is invoked by cache before writing data into it.

getHasChanged() method
boolean getHasChanged( $cache )
$cache yii\caching\Cache The cache component that is currently evaluating this dependency
return boolean whether the dependency has changed.

Returns a value indicating whether the dependency has changed.

resetReusableData() method
void resetReusableData( )

Resets all cached data for reusable dependencies.

generateDependencyData() method
mixed generateDependencyData( $cache )
$cache yii\caching\Cache The cache component that is currently evaluating this dependency
return mixed the data needed to determine if dependency has been changed.

Generates the data needed to determine if dependency has been changed.

Derived classes should override this method to generate the actual dependency data.
